article.aside: Renamed kdata_min(3) and kdata_max(3) to kdata_ymin(3) and kdata_ymax(3), respectively. Added kdata_xmin(3) and kdata_xmax(3). Added kdata_xmean(3), kdata_ymean(3), kdata_xstddev(3), and kdata_ystddev(3). Added (or rather, exposed) kdata_set(3) for generically modifying bucket contents and kdata_get(3) for getting. Added kdata_pmfmean(3), kdata_pmfstddev(3), and kdata_pmfvar(3).
